PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2006-11032006-10-19FIN,  ,  ,  , 
ActIncome Tax Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (CAPITAL COST ALLOWANCE - FORESTRY BIOENERGY EQUIPMENT) by adding energy-generating equipment using SPENT PULPING LIQUOR (a.k.a. black fuel) as fuel to the list of alternative-fuel equipment that is eligible for the accelerated rate of asset depreciation announced in the 2006 Budget.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2006-0249 Publication Date: 2006-11-01
AttachmentsAttachment
